headline: AEROTECH LINEAR BALL SCREW STAGE, 24" TRAVEL
description: Linear Super-Precision Ball Screw Stage    Aerotech ATS50060-M-02P
specstable:
Manufacturer Aerotech
Model ATS50060-M-02P
Configuration Single Axis
Total Travel, XYZ X: 24.00 in (610 mm)
Mechanical Drive System Superprecision Ball screw
Stage Bearing Type Ball Bearing
Screw Pitch 5 turns per inch
Linear Accuracy +/- 2 microns
Stage Length 39.00 in (991 mm)
Stage Width 10.00 in (254 mm)
Table Length 10.00 in (254.00 mm)
Table Width 10.00 in (254.00 mm)
Tabletop Height 4.75 in (120.65 mm)
Maximum Payload 300.00 lb (136.08 kg)
Maximum Travel Speed 12.000 in/s (305 mm/s)
Motor Drive: Servo Motor Size: NEMA 34
Accessories

BM500 brushless servo motor included (peak speed = 4000 rpm)

Other Information

Metric dimension mounting pattern and holes

Exterior Dimensions
Width 49.000 in (124.5 cm)
Depth 10.000 in (25.4 cm)
Height 4.750 in (12.1 cm)
Weight 120 lb (54 kg)
